thread.title: Photographer Is Changing Special-Needs Kids' Lives One Picture at a Time
thread.title_full: Photographer Is Changing Special-Needs Kids' Lives One Picture at a Time

title: Photographer Is Changing Special-Needs Kids' Lives One Picture at a Time
text: Tweet Share Photographer Stephanie Smith decided she wanted to use her talent and skill to help brighten kids’ lives. It all started when she heard about another photographer who refused to shoot for a child with Down syndrome, and it broke her heart. “These kids deserve to be loved and looked at equally,” Smith explains. Stephanie Smith and Lenses With Love offer kids with special needs and their families free photo shoots. (Photo: NBC) More After launching her effort to share her time with families with special needs on Facebook, the requests wouldn’t stop coming in. Now, her group Lenses With Love is connecting over 250 families around the country and 100 willing photographers. See just a few of their stories in the video above. Read more from Yahoo Style + Beauty:
